interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Inglourious Basterds [Blu-ray] Review Date: 2010/05/24 Store: Brad Pitt (Actor), Mike Myers (Actor), Quentin Tarantino (Director) & 0 more Rated: R Format: Blu-ray Categories: Movies & TV, Featured Categories, Blu-ray, Action & Adventure Product Description: ['Brad Pitt takes no prisoners in Quentin Tarantino’s high-octane WWII revenge fantasy Inglourious Basterds. As war rages in Europe, a Nazi-scalping squad of American soldiers, known to their enemy as “The Basterds,” is on a daring mission to take down the leaders of the Third Reich. Bursting with “action, hair-trigger suspense and a machine-gun spray of killer dialogue” (Peter Travers, Rolling Stone), Inglourious Basterds is “another Tarantino masterpiece” (Jake Hamilton, CBS-TV)!'] Average Rating: 4.8 Product Details: {'Genre': 'Le commando des batards, DVD Movie, Inglorious Bastards, Military & War, Blu-ray Movie, Quentin Tarantino, Action & Adventure/Thrillers, Action & AdventureLe commando des batards, DVD Movie, Inglorious Bastards, Military & War, Blu-ray Movie, Quentin Tarantino, Action & Adventure/Thrillers, Action & Adventure See more', 'Format': 'Multiple Formats, AC-3, Blu-ray, Color, Dolby, DTS Surround Sound, Dubbed, NTSC, Special Edition, Subtitled, Widescreen, Digital_copyMultiple Formats, AC-3, Blu-ray, Color, Dolby, DTS Surround Sound, Dubbed, NTSC, Special Edition, Subtitled, Widescreen, Digital_copy See more', 'Contributor': 'Hilmar Eichhorn, Ludger Pistor, Richard Sammel, Rod Taylor, Sylvester Groth, Til Schweiger, Enzo G. Castellari, Gedeon Burkhard, Christian Berkel, André Penvern, Brad Pitt, Mélanie Laurent, Bo Svenson, Michael Bacall, Buddy Joe Hooker, Quentin Tarantino, Cristoph Waltz, Ennio Morricone, Mike Myers, Robert Richardson, August DiehlHilmar Eichhorn, Ludger Pistor, Richard Sammel, Rod Taylor, Sylvester Groth, Til Schweiger, Enzo G. Castellari, Gedeon Burkhard, Christian Berkel, André Penvern, Brad Pitt, Mélanie Laurent, Bo Svenson, Michael Bacall, Buddy Joe Hooker, Quentin Tarantino, Cristoph Waltz,… See more', 'Language': 'French (DTS 5.1), English (DTS-HD Master Audio 5.1), Spanish (DTS 5.1)', 'Runtime': '2 hours and 33 minutes', 'Aspect Ratio': '2.40:1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'R (Restricted)', 'Product Dimensions': '6.75 x 5.3 x 0.45 inches; 4 Ounces', 'Director': 'Quentin Tarantino', 'Media Format': 'Multiple Formats, AC-3, Blu-ray, Color, Dolby, DTS Surround Sound, Dubbed, NTSC, Special Edition, Subtitled, Widescreen, Digital_copy', 'Run time': '2 hours and 33 minutes', 'Release date': 'December 15, 2009', 'Actors': 'Brad Pitt, Mike Myers, Cristoph Waltz, Michael Bacall, Bo Svenson', 'Dubbed': 'French, Spanish', 'Subtitles': 'English, French, Spanish', 'Studio': 'Universal Studios Home Entertainment', 'Number of discs': '2'} Review Text: The movie was great but, my Blu-Ray player would play everything on the disk except the movie. I updated the firmware on the player and it still wouldn't play.
From from what I read on the internet no movies by universal will play on this Blu-Ray player because Phillips won't update the firmware. Review Title: Would not play on my Phillips Blu-Ray bdp7200 Rating: 4.0 --------------------------------------------------

profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Genre Preference:** The user enjoys action and adventure films, particularly those with high levels of suspense and intense storytelling, as suggested by their choice of a Quentin Tarantino film.
- **Director Affinity:** They have a notable appreciation for Quentin Tarantino, indicating a preference for films characterized by unique narratives and dialogue-driven plots.
- **Actor Favoritism:** The inclusion of well-known actors like Brad Pitt suggests an attraction to films featuring prominent and charismatic performers.
- **Format Preference:** The user favors Blu-ray format, indicating a preference for high-quality video and audio experiences.
- **Technical Awareness:** They display a level of technical awareness and concern regarding playback issues with Blu-ray players, suggesting they value seamless media experiences and may invest in compatible technology.
- **Mixed Experience:** Although they appreciated the movie overall, they encountered a significant technical issue with playback, indicating potential frustration with brands or technology that do not meet their expectations.

Overall, the user profile reflects a preference for quality cinematic experiences, a specific interest in acclaimed filmmakers and actors, and a desire for reliability in technology.
